text: ‘‘bas thiyenawa ane...
yowun dal pandu kandama dakunu koriyawata
eyata oba muhuna dena aakaraya obe wayasath samagama wenas wenawa.
2816 warayak kiyawa atha	awasan warata sanskaranaya kale 2018 janawari 09, angaharuwada 12:38
me ayurin pradeshiya deshapaluwan gama kaddith atham madhyama deshapalanagnyayan rata kaddith rate sanwardhanayak siduwima da ek athakin wismithaya.

siyallatama mul wanne thama sithayi pirisidu sithen ee deth karanna.me pranitha aaharaya budu rajananwahansege pramukha maha sangharathnaya udesa wikalayeda puja kala haki uthum pujawaki.dina thuna hatharak pamana narak nowi bothal wala asura thaba tiken tika puja kirimata hakiya.(shithakarana thula thabanna epa) 👉👆anekuth wishmitha thorathuru👆👌 uputa ganimaki....

aposa samanya pela wibhagayen wishayayan 6 k samathwima saha disthi්rak ki්rada tharangayakin thewana sthanaya laba ganima me sandaha wana awama sudusukama wu athara, mewani sudusukam rahitha pirisakata da pasal paddhathiya thula pathwim labadima sambandhayen lanka guru sangamaya digin digatama wirodhaya pala karana ladi.

wijewira, wiktar ayiwan ha gamini bas..
umbaa nam niyama soyaganimak ama...

ee athara kridagara, mehi athi swabhawika lawanathawaya nisa wiwida ledarogawalata simitha pirisakata ee asuren prathikara karana madhyasthana saha wiwida winoda katayuthu sadaha wenkeruna sthanayanda mehi pihita thibe.

mema sewawa goda nagima sandaha awashya chandrika, palana madhyasthana, adhithakshanika upakarana yanadi siyallama menma chandrika uduguwanata yawana rokattuda purna washayen indiyawe nirmanaya kota nishpadanaya kirimata thiranaya kota atha.
chandrika mathiniyage palana kalaya awasan wanawita nangi aa prawanathawa wuye upadhidharinta rakiya labadime wadasatahanayi.

ema aadiwasi nayakayin malawun wala damu than dana siti athara ema parikshanayedi migalo daksha lesa ema minis atakatu pawathina than soya ganima owun da pudumayata pathkarawana sulu wiya.“hariyata mini atakatu pawathina thanata giya migalo ethana pahuru gamata patan gaththa.
ee kiyanne kalin akuru sarayi rahayi.
potowe inne thilaka ranasinha mahathmiya neda?
ohu ada jiwathwanne amerikawe manasika rohalakaya.
kendarayaka lagnaya hathara wanna hath wanna daha wanna yana sthanawala grahayan thanpath nowu wita hathara kendaraya palu yayi nigamanaya we.
ilakkaya wetha pamini pasu eyata athuluwima wadath sudusu kumana dishawenda?
liyaganna bari pramanaya mita wada bohoma wadiyi aruni.
diya hakida wadanak hadunwanu me asahanaya...!
ude lekchar ekanan tikak withara boring ya.
danata wartha wana paridi ema awasthawa rangana herathta pawarenu athayi kiyawe.
sar poddak allanko wahane bokak danna puluwan thanakata...naga depasata ambaaremin wan rathaye pasupasa kalapaye sita handa awadi karayi.
thawath bambu gana kiyawanne nathiwa ee gamanata sahaya denna aakalpa wenasak athi karaganna purudu wemu neda?
eka kelawarakata wenna ekinekata tharamak aathin gata dekak thibuna.
podu katayuthu sandaha suba dawasa 14 sinha jiwanopaya marga pilibanda amathara wagakim bhara ganimata siduwiya hakiya.
ma nitharama pothpath kiyawanawa.

sinhala katha karana sama wenuwen wishwaya amathime warapa්rasadaya labune katada – ee thiranaya nila nowana mattamin amerikanu sarasawiyak gaththe kelesada – eya amerikanu adhipathiwadaye ma thawath udaharanayak da – aadi washayen atham patakayan ma samaga tharka kala.

wisheshanga mul pituwa puwath --nawathama - aarakshaka --janapathi - parlimenthuwa - agamathi --kalina siduwim saha deshapalana --sanwardhana - pradeshiya --sanskruthika saha kala --wides - krida --pa්radeshiya puwath aarthika shrawya drushya kawuluwa --prabhalekhana mandura --widiyo rangahala wisheshanga kabinat thirana wimarshana wishesha aawarana --dina 100 wadasatahana --tharuna samuluwa --2015 ayawaya wimasim --pera web adawiya ---pera web adawiya - 1 ---pera web adawiya - 2 --tendar danwim --ayandumpath bhagatha kirim

gahapiyaw dana gahannena maruwath danagahanna " kiya pawasa siti wita muladanin bhaya wi gasimata kawurunwath idiripath wune nathiwa ohuwa yawu bawa kathuwaraya pawasayi.

satan wiramaya aarambha wi paya kihipayakata pasuwa hayat tarir al-sham (kalin siriyawe alkayida shakhawa) kandayama saha ehi mithra kandayam alapo nagaraye shaba, al-kalidiya,al-neyil, al-sabil saha tish rin yana disthrikka ilakka kara kalathuwakku prahara ella kalaha.

le halana ekath aadambara wenna deyak thamayi balagena giyahama. 71, 89, thawa awurudu 30 k warin wara!
awasanaye siduwuyeda eyamaya.
ee bawa apa kihipa wathawak ma kiya athi namuth deshapalanagnyayan ha janamadhyakaruwan ee thuttuwakatawath ganan ganne naha.

ohuge ema illima, ohu parani yal panagiya wyapruthiyaka sawweku bawa heli kirimata wada, lankawe mebandu chitha්rapatayak janagatha kirime di sawignyanika wa ekanga wu mohothak lesa salakima wada yogyaya we.
ithiri ardhaya kumakda?.

api ayath wanne ihatha kulaka deken kumakatadayi sitha balanna.

kolambaa 07 bauddhaloka mawathe seruwila bauddha madhyasthanaye ‘shanthi padaname anushasaka kotapola amarakiththi himige anushasana paridi shri lankawasi janathawata aashirwada patha me masa 23 wanida sita 2014 wasare janawari 01 dina aluyama dakwa no kadawa dina 09 k thula ් rathana suthra deshana pinkama pawathwimata katayuthu yoda atha.

apata yam anathurak siduwunahama apiwa eyin beraganimata idiriyata paminena mithrayin, eseth nathnam mudal agahingakamak, ledak, dukak pamini wita apa wetha pamina udaw upakara kirimata pakilenne nathi mithrayin dirgha kalinawa asuru kirimata puluwan.
ee wagema eya niwaradiwa ha sadakalika mathakaye randena ayurin uganwannata ohuta sahaja dakshathawayak thibuna.
ee gana hithana kota nam puduma sathutak dannenne.
namak nomathiwa ankayak pamanak laba di athi g rahaka sadaha sammatha namaya bhawitha we.
uthsawaya aarambhayedi ee kuda daruwan itha alankara lesa rangapamin nawasilanthaye jathika giya gayuwa.
ohu wiwaha wi aththe arjun mahendrange diyaniya samagaya. 2012di me wiwahaya siduwi athi athara arjun mahendran 2015di shri lanka maha bankuwe adhipathi thanathurata pathwiya.
ee thamanta rakshanayak ho prathipurnayak nathi bawa pawasimen.
kalpithayak lesa danbar kiyanne manawa samajayanhi bhasha bihi wimata gosip kirime awashyathawa prabala uththejakayak wu bawayi.
ubata man kiyana wishaya gana awabodayak na naththan man kiyanade therum ganna uthsaha karanneth na. .

mun hadanna baha.
sarwa sadharanayi.nagare inna ekek gamata aawamath ohomma thamayi.//

lowa bihiwu wadathma sarthaka amerikanu tenis kridikawa wemin siya16 wani grand slam tenis shurathawath dina ganu athayi wicharakayan anawaki pala kala serina wiliyams eeye siya rate hima prathiwadi nawaka kridika sloni stiwans hamuwe parajayata pathwi tharagawaliyen iwath wuwaya.dedena athara eeye melbarn hi di pawathi ardha awasan purwa tharagaye di athdakim nomathi 19hawiridi sloni hamuwe aarambhaka wataye di peramuna ganimata 31hawiridi serina samathwuwada pitakonde athiwu hadisi aabadhayak hethuwen dewani ha awasan watayedi dadi pasubamakata lakwuwaya.
ratata awashya aluth jawaya athi tharuna balawega walata awasthawa sapayima bawa penwa diya yuthuya.

eya, mada peradiga samajawadi eksath janapadayak sandaha satan wadima thula thama aragalaya arabi, thurki, kurdi ha yudew kamkaruwange aragala samaga eksath kirimatath, yuddhaya ha adhirajyawadayata erehiwa loka wyaparayak goda nagimata ek wana lesa amarikawa athulu anekuth wadi diyunu dhaneshwara ratawala kamkaruwanta aayachanaya kirimatath danuwath pa්rayathnayak dariya yuthuya.
game hitiya abekon kiyala dosthara mahaththayek.
anek athata thissa aththanayaka kiya sitiye nawa sandhanaya thula eksath jathika pakshikayata nisi thana labiya yuthu bawayi.
nawa kusalatha aakarshanaya kara ganima ha bandawa ganima sambandhayen boho sanwidhana itha paladayi wana namuth ekama kusalatha randawa ganimata samahara awasthawan waladi owun asamath we.
un thamayi meyage surathallu bawata pathwela inne.

kabinat eka athule bahin bas wim wadi wiya.

loka bankuwa ha jathyanthara mulya aramudala wani jathyanthara mulya aayathana wisin me ratawal walata, thaman wetha athi owunge nayagathibhawaya padanam karagena idiripath karanu labana niyamayan sapura lima sandaha mudal sampadanaya kara ganimata pawathina ekama maga wanne mese ehi bara soba dahama ha minisa matha wada wadath ihalin patawima pamanaki.
ehidi  kridakayan amathu agramathya ranil wikramasinha kiya sitiye kridawe diyunuwa wenuwen aanduwa piyawara rasak kriyathmaka karana bawayi.
(meheyum paddhathi wethin yali-yomu karana ladi)
methana sidu wi aththe abhyanthara thorathuru laba dime aparadhayak no we nam, eya wruththika nosalakilimathkamin rajayata padu wana andamin kriya kirime warada wiya yuthu ya.
kalu salli hadenne saha wadiwenne aanduwak genena nithi nisamayi.
emenma shrilanipaye maithri parshwaya ha mahindage pohottu parshwaya wenwa tharaga wadime wasiya himi wanneth ejapayata.
mage punchi kompaniye katayuththak sadaha kalin karapu illimakata ekthara pudgalayek muna gahenna awasthawak illapu ekaka prathipalayak lesata thamayi me durakathana amathuma labune...
lesayi danwala thiyenne.
eheth usas nirmana kalaya ha deshaya yana karunu abhibawa chirath kalayak rasawahanaya karana bawin ewani teli nirmana apa ratehi bihiwi athidayi adhyayanaya kota baliya yuthuya.
mewana wita eksath jathika pakshayata aluth muhunuwarak dimata awashya bawath aluth wenasak awashya wi athi bawath eksath jathika pakshaye hitapu maha lekam tha...
apa ranil ta kiyanne apa mema madhyastha kotas dina ganna bawayi.
ee uthsahayan nisama apitath ape podi unta kawada hari kiyanna deyak ithuru una...
owun wishakapathnam distha්rikkaye ganesh nohoth wenkatha්ramana saha thelengana pa්ranthaye yadhari distha්rikkaye, dasireddiguda wala daya nohoth samala ka්risthayiya wuha.

asankheyiya hatharakuth kalpa lakshayak parami pura , siyalu sathun kerehi maha karunawen wadala uthum wu shri saddharmaye wadagathma wadanaki, dharmathawayaki anichcha.
gaurawaniya pujya pakshayen awasarayi.
rakiya labadimedith manthri nowu sanwidhayakawarayata wishesha awastha dunna.
